thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother makes embarassing gaffe as it announces winner Coleen Nolan has been EVICTED as she is crowned champion
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother makes embarassing gaffe as it announces winner Coleen Nolan has been EVICTED as she is crowned champion

author: cgreenwood
title: Celebrity Big Brother makes embarassing gaffe as it announces winner Coleen Nolan has been EVICTED as she is crowned champion
text:
TV Magazine Awkward Celebrity Big Brother makes embarassing gaffe as it announces winner Coleen Nolan has been EVICTED as she is crowned champion 
Winner Coleen was 'evicted' by whoever was in charge of the show's massive megascreens Revealed 4th February 2017, 12:51 am CELEBRITY Big Brother made an embarrassing gaffe during the final – evicting winner Coleen Nolan. 
As the Loose Women star left the Channel 5 reality show house in victory, the megascreens behind her disagreed and flashed up ‘EVICTED’ instead of ‘winner’. 17 Coleen was faced with this banner when she left the house 
Fortunately champion Coleen didn’t seem put out by the awkward mistake and continued her victory interview in style. 
The Loose Women panellist beat Jedward in the final two and burst into tears when Emma Willis announced her name over the Irish twins. 
Coleen can finally be reunited with her family after her second stint in the Celebrity Big Brother house, where she finished as the runner up. 
But before that, she had her winner’s chat with Emma, and admitted she doesn’t feel like she deserved to win. 
She said: “Don’t make me cry I’ve done so much crying on this show. I’m traumatised. PA:Press Association Coleen Nolan has won Celebrity Big Brother Getty Images - WireImage Coleen was shocked and in tears at the result Coleen Nolan wins Celebrity Big Brother 2017 beating Jedward 
Coleen beat Jedward to the CBB crown 
"I’ve never won anything in my life on my own ever. 
"If I put my hand on my heart I didn’t deserve to win it as I have been boring." PA:Press Association 17 Coleen was in floods of tears as she came outside to greet the crowd 
Having previously been on the show in 2012, Coleen admitted her second stint had been even harder than her first. 
She said: "It was absolutely horrendous, a million times worse. PA:Press Association 17 Her tears soon turned to elation as the news sank in 
"They were brutal this time, it was just relentless, there was something every day and it seemed to be always negative. The way some people just left, it was brutal." 
Coleen also had to deal with being told she was "two faced" and "least trustworthy" by the public during two tasks, which she found hard to take. PA:Press Association Coleen celebrated after her winners chat with Emma Willis 
She said: "It really got to my head. 
"Getting negative comments, when you’re in the house you can deal with it, but when you’re hearing it from the outside, that’s hard. PA:Press Association 17 Coleen confessed she didn't think she deserved to win 
"I do care what people think, if that makes me weak and pathetic then I wear that badge with pride. 
"It’s been much tougher, I got through day seven and I never once said I want to leave, at that point [when she heard the negative comments]I thought s*d you I’m going to stay. PA:Press Association The Loose Women star was surrounded by confetti after her win 
"Each time something happened again it wasn’t affecting me so much." 
The star had an action-packed final week, acting as an agony aunt to Bianca Gascoigne after he housemate beau Jamie O'Hara was evicted from the show in a shock twist at the start of the week, as well as being shocked by a chat about sex toys. 
Calum Best and Nicola McLean were left in hysterics as they compared the model's lippy to a "butt plug". 
"I thought it was a butt plug," Calum laughed in the clip, which was aired on CBB's Bit On The Side tonight. FIVE/CBBBOTS Coleen Nolan was shocked by her housemates' comments 
Coleen replied: "You're so gross," before saying: "I wouldn't even know what one looked like." 
Nicola then got involved as she joked: "I heard they do one with the horse hair to make it look like Tony the Pony." 
Calum replied: "A butt plug with a mane coming out the back of it so you look like a pony." FIVE/CBBBOTS Nicola McLean laughed off the sex toy comparisons FIVE/CBBBOTS Calum Best immediately made a raunchy comparison Celebrity Big Brother's Speidi say Kim Woodburn is playing a 'game' on Bit On The Side 
To which Coleen said: "Well I know what to buy you for Christmas." RELATED STORIES LAV LOVE LAD Jamie O'Hara admits he NEARLY had sex with Bianca Gascoigne in the Celebrity Big Brother toilet 'NO REGRETS' Celebrity Big Brother star Jamie O'Hara refuses to apologise about fling with Bianca Gascoigne CELEBRITY BIG BOTHER Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry SNUBS tonight's CBB final in favour of MTV filming commitments JUST A QUICKIE Calum Best had a fling with Wayne Rooney hooker Helen Wood shortly before entering CBB house 
However it hasn't all been fun and games for Coleen, as she was left in a rage after being confronted by former housemate John McCririck during a judgement task. 
The former housemate returned to the Channel 5 reality show as a guest on Sunday night's show as part of a judgement task alongside Luisa Zissman, Saira Khan, Vanessa Feltz and Austin Armacost. Ruckas 17 John McCririck laid into Coleen Nolan on Celebrity Big Brother on Sunday night 
John, 76, wasted no time sinking his claws into the Loose Women panellist , blasting her for eating too much and being boring. 
He said: "Coleen, the last time you were in the house, you were reckoned to be the most boring, dull housemate there had ever been. 
"You've lived up to your reputation. I've made allowances for the fact you're at the time of life that is difficult for women, I fully accept that, but let us look at what you have done. Ruckas 17 John questioned how Coleen could be an agony aunt when her marriage is falling apart and she eats and smokes too much 
"You have since become an agony aunt, and what you have done here, you have admitted your own marriage is in crisis. 
"You are unable sound counselling and advice to people who have come to you for it, instead you have been weeping and blubbing and begging for their help. John McCririck lays into Coleen Nolan on Celebrity Big Brother 
"You smoke too much, you eat too much, who are you to give advice as an agony aunt?" 
When Vanessa, who acted as a judge over the proceedings, asked if the housemates in the dock had anything to say, Nicola McLean said he was "vile" and that he should apologise to Coleen. Coleen Nolan slams 'vile' John McCririck on Celebrity Big Brother Ruckas Nicola McLean branded John's comments vile 
Back in the bedroom, the 51-year-old was raging as she discussed the moment with Jamie O'Hara. 
She said: "How dare he? He's an absolute p***k. God forgive my language. F*** off. F***ing a*
